website_summaries.verdict: While a stronger chemical such as glycolic acid may be a better choice for issues like scars and wrinkles, this peel is a good pick for helping clear up and control a host of breakout issues.
pros: Fairly gentle and easy to use with the active ingredient lactic acid – a solution often selected for mild exfoliation and the removal of dead skin cells
Contains plant extracts that soothe skin
cons: A few mixed reviews on the results it produces, but many happy customers who reported clearer skin and noticeable differences in break outs

customer_reviews.title: In a good way! But be careful and follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: This sh#t is strong! In a good way! But be careful and follow the directions. This seems to even work better for me than what is used during a facial. Highly recommend using a vitamin serum afterwards and a strong moisturizer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W

customer_reviews.title: This is very strong be sure to follow the directions ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very strong be sure to follow the directions. Start with about 1 minute on your face and work up to more
customer_reviews.author: Judy Raineri

customer_reviews.title: Good value for being a non professional product.
customer_reviews.text: Licensed Cosmetologist review- I liked this product, I've only used it once but it resurfaced my face without major discomfort or peeling. If you have permanent make up make sure that you keep the product an inch away from it because it will strip it. I followed it up with some hyaluronic acid. Total time I left the product on was 3 minutes. Next time I plan on having fresh aloe to sooth and tighten my skin after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley D Perez

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Makes skin smooth and soft
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Makes skin smooth and soft. It gently peels away the dead skin of the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Aleen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Removes the first layer of skin and my skin looks awesome a week later! It really works and is aweome i use this 2x a month! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: ty

customer_reviews.title: Smoother skin/reduced acne scars
customer_reviews.text: My very first time using it last night. After one use my skin appears to already be more smoother. My acne scars seemed to be a little less noticeable. I can’t wait until 6 months from now to see how much my scar reduction improves.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE

customer_reviews.title: Salon treatment from my own home
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after having a professional treatment and loved the result but didn't want to pay a fortune to do it consistently. I leave it on slightly less time than recommended because I have sensitive skin and the results are fantastic. Make sure you have the neutralizing spray to stop the acid from working when you are done and wash gently with warm water. I try to avoid using it after sun exposure but considering how expensive spa treatments are this is insanely affordable and easy to use in five minutes or less.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use on legs and arms, not my face. I felt I needed something to help tackle age related skin degradation and sun damage. I've only just started to use it but since this is not my first experience with acids, I can already feel the quality in this product. I like that it is a gel formula which means it doesn't run. This will allow the product to absorb and do its job. It's the right strength for the time being and I can feel it working. Overall, I'm happy with it and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Buy the neutralizing serum with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to not exceed the 1-3 minutes the packaging recommends you keep the peel on or you may have chapped areas of skin. I've only used this peel twice and am already loving how it helps smooth out fine lines and lighten some sun damage I have on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Culp

customer_reviews.title: Professional Product
customer_reviews.text: I did my first acid peel with this lactic acid product. It was excellent. Make sure you have a neutralizer ready because you will need it quickly. That lactic acid works fast. Three minutes worked well for me but I don’t have sensitive skin. Skin was smooth and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE GRAHAM

customer_reviews.title: Great for exfoliating at home
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend for sensitive skin, but It does a great job of exfoliating at home. I use about once per week and get alot of compliments on the smoothness of my skin. Great value for the money, as you would pay several times the purchase price to get a peel like this at your local spa!
customer_reviews.author: donna yates

customer_reviews.title: Expected to peel
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to peel as I left it on my skin for over 7 minutes. I guess that’s alright. Each skin reacts differently. I have applied it 2 this week already. So far not much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: JussG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and priced so great!! Best lactic I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I love this chemical peel. It’s a gel consistency which I haven’t ever had before but I love it, makes for super easy application. This product has helped with my hyperpigmentation which is why I bought it. And the price is so great considering how much you pay in a salon for one lactic acid peel.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Are used this on my toes!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually looking for a product to put on my toe cuticles. They are always so dry. I am so excited to say that it works! This is a product you have to be very careful with though. I would say probably put too much on, but it worked out OK. For my purposes, it's five star
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: This product works exactly as expected. My face feels smooth and healthy after using this product, plus it's gentle enough to use on my rosacea skin.

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Money wasted!!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money!! No peeling just gonna make your skin dry and looks wrinkly. If I could return this product I would gladly do. It doesn’t do anything but mess up your skin. If you looking for peeling definitely this product is not for you. I don’t see any use for at all

customer_reviews.text: I like to give myself facials.At my age 59 i like the results I get with the product.. Thank you .

customer_reviews.title: Strong and effective.
customer_reviews.text: This is strong. Read the instructions. Don’t improvise with this stuff. I use it once every two weeks and it is helping to bring things to the surface.

customer_reviews.title: good grade

customer_reviews.title: My complexion is pretty clear now--it was getting rough-looking and I needed a ...
customer_reviews.text: My complexion is pretty clear now--it was getting rough-looking and I needed a perk-me-up, which the lactic acid did! I did have some scabbing and peeling for 4 days after doing the peel, but once it all sloughed off, it looks great! I thought it would get rid of my age spots, but it didn't--I might need a stronger peel for that, but this is great for now. I'm using the peptide complex serum for the next 2 weeks as they recommend and I'm also using the lightening serum to see if my spots get lighter.
customer_reviews.author: xhilogirl

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Dead Skin Off
customer_reviews.text: This removes the dead cells so that blackheads don't build up. Leaves your skin glowing.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it burns.
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap - I only had this peel on for a few minutes and it burned my cheek skin. I have tiny scabs on my face, but they are healing quickly. Be careful when using. This is strong stuff!

customer_reviews.text: very strong on my skin, works great but I have to use sparingly.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I’ve been getting microdermabrasion & face peels for years. With COVID-19, I haven’t been able to see my aesthetion. I followed directions the first time. Felt a little bitty sting. I’ve increased it to 10 mins. Now. It definitely works. My skin is tighter, smooth, had some minor peeling. Just as good as the Obagi blue peel. I also have the serum & neutralizer. Highly recommend. Do be careful & follow directions, especially if you’ve ne er had a peel before.

customer_reviews.text: I have SUPER oily skin so I slapped this serum on for 10 mins, didn't feel a thing, washed it off with a gentle cleanser. My skin feels baby smooth. I have had no redness or irritation, I was actually wondering if they had a higher concentration. The only thing I forgot to do was purchase sunscreen which I have because that is super important when using these products. If you have dry or combo skin I would say proceed with caution.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Good not intense peel
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t too strong- which is good I used 30sec first time and then used baking soda with water to neutralize. Now I’m up to 3min 30 sec and very happy with results. I do not like to peel so I keep my time low. I’ll go up until too much. It depends on your skin and how exfoliated you are. The last time I felt much more burn because I used an exfoliating scrub prior. Wouldn’t recommend doing this the first time. The results are good. Im not glowing (so 4/5) but I feel like it helps my pores and hormonal acne. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: It works.

So far so good, I like what I see. Most important the instructions are non existent. I have common sense about chemicals, some people do not. please put this right so that nobody gets hurt.

product_meta.title: Lactic Acid 50% Gel Peel with Kojic Acid and Bearberry & Licorice Root Extracts - Professional Grade Chemical Face Peel - Alpha Hydroxy Acid - 1 Bottle of 1 fl oz
feature_bullets: WARNING: DO NOT USE WITHOUT DOING AN INITIAL PATCH TEST. This product contains Lactic Acid. Because sensitivity to Lactic Acid varies substantially from person to person, we STRONGLY RECOMMEND to ALWAYS test the product on a small area before using it. In order to test, apply a small quantity of product on a very limited dime-sized area, behind the ear or under the chin, and wait for 2 to 3 minutes to assess your sensitivity to the peel.

PROFESSIONAL GRADE Lactic Acid Face Peel: especially effective for Age Spots, Freckles, Sun Spots, Skin Lightening, Hyperpigmentation, Wrinkles and Fine Lines. Each bottle contains up to 20 complete facial applications. Do it yourself at home and save on expensive spa treatments!
GEL PEEL: contrary to many other peels on the market, this product is a light gel and NOT A LIQUID. This helps prevent the product from trickling down your face or dripping into your eyes or mouth.
KOJIC ACID, BEARBERRY AND LICORICE EXTRACTS: very effective natural ingredients that promote a brighter and more even skin tone and uniform complexion by acting as melanin inhibitors.
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – All QRxLabs products are covered by our Money Back Guarantee. If you are not 100% happy with one of our products, we will refund your purchase.
